## IRegisterWithAs.within() method

Specifies resolution instance scope. Scope determines how resolved service instances behave in between resolutions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
within(scope: Scope): RegisterWithScope<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | <code>Scope</code> | the value of the scope [Scope](./typeioc.scope.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RegisterWithScope<T>`

- an instance of [RegisterWithScope](./typeioc.registerwithscope.md) interface
